messages.subject: Re: New Blog
messages.msgSnippet: Hi Leslie... That s great that you re starting a blog. There can t be enough unschooling ones out there. You can link to our unschooling blog. Here s the url:
messages.messageBody:
Hi Leslie...

That's great that you're starting a blog. There can't be enough
unschooling ones out there. You can link to our unschooling blog.
Here's the url: http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/

PLease don't link me to homeschool blogger and you should consider
starting your blog someone place else. Lots of people have left HSB
already because of what happened.

~ Joanne ~
Mom to Jacqueline (7), Shawna (10) & Cimion (13)
Adopted into our hearts October 30, 2003
http://anunschoolinglife.blogspot.com/
http://foreverparents.com

messages.subject: Re: New Blog
messages.msgSnippet: Hey Lesa, thanks for this info. I ve never heard any of this before (I don t even know who the Pearls are) but I will definitely check it out more thoroughly.
messages.messageBody:
Hey Lesa, thanks for this info. I've never heard any of this before (I
don't even know who the Pearls are) but I will definitely check it out
more thoroughly. I definitely don't condone any of that if it is all
true. In the meantime, if you would let me link you to my blogspot
blog, I would love that. Thanks again!

-------Original Message-------

From: lesliel23
Date: 05/11/06 20:18:07
To: unschoolingbasics@yahoogroups.com
Subject: [unschoolingbasics] New Blog

Hey everyone,

I just wanted to let you know I started a new blog. I already have one
at www.thebrownlowdown.blogspot.com that I use as just a general blog.
My new one is www.homeschoolblogger.com/LeapOfFaith and is devoted to
our new adventures in unschooling. Just wanted to let everyone know in
case you wanted to check it out. I would love to get other people's
blogs to add to my links if you want them out there. You can email
them to me off list at LeslieL23@...

Thanks,
Leslie in Moody, AL





SPONSORED LINKS Secondary school education Graduate school education Home
school education
Graduate school education online High school education Chicago school
education

messages.subject: New Blog
messages.msgSnippet: Hey everyone, I just wanted to let you know I started a new blog. I already have one at www.thebrownlowdown.blogspot.com that I use as just a general blog. My
messages.messageBody:
Hey everyone,

I just wanted to let you know I started a new blog. I already have one
at www.thebrownlowdown.blogspot.com that I use as just a general blog.
My new one is www.homeschoolblogger.com/LeapOfFaith and is devoted to
our new adventures in unschooling. Just wanted to let everyone know in
case you wanted to check it out. I would love to get other people's
blogs to add to my links if you want them out there. You can email
them to me off list at LeslieL23@...

Thanks,
Leslie in Moody, AL
